Test Name: Inborn Errors of Immunity with Immune Dysregulation and Autoimmunity Gene Panel
Specimen Type: Genomic DNA extracted from patient specimen
Purpose: To detect and classify genetic variants associated with inborn errors of immunity, immune dysregulation, and autoimmunity.
Container: Microcentrifuge tube or equivalent DNA storage tube
Equipment: Sequencing platform (e.g., Illumina MiSeq/NextSeq), DNA extraction kit, thermal cycler for PCR, and bioinformatics software (e.g., GATK, FastQC)
